item.huanle.green_dragon_sword.desc: Poisons enemies for 5 seconds on hit
item.huanle.green_dragon_sword.desc2: 20% chance to gain temporary speed boost
item.huanle.green_dragon_sword.desc3: Restores 2 health points on hit with 10% probability
item.huanle.sun_god_sword.desc: Right-click to release a skill and gain Haste II effect for 5 seconds
item.huanle.sun_god_sword.desc2: Deals 5 damage in a 16x16 area and sets entities on fire
item.huanle.throwing_axe.charge: Hold right-click to charge, longer charging increases throwing distance
enchantment.huanle.lightning_strike.desc: Summons lightning when hitting an entity, more strikes at higher levels. Works on swords, tridents, and axes
enchantment.huanle.quick_draw.desc: Reduces bow draw time by 0.3 seconds per level
item.huanle.ender_sword.desc: Right-click to throw an Ender Pearl
item.huanle.ender_sword.desc2: 20% chance to deal extra damage and apply Weakness buff

advancements.huanle.root.title: Discoverer of Magic Crystal
item.huanle.lava_sword.desc: Sets entities on fire when attacking
advancements.huanle.lava_sword.title: Lava Swordsman
item.huanle.moonlight_sword.desc: Right-click to shoot a blue crescent arc (cooldown 2 seconds)
item.huanle.moonlight_sword.desc2: Freezes targets hit by the arc for 10 seconds
effect.huanle.freezing.desc: Reduces movement speed by 30% per level and deals 0.5 magic damage over time
item.huanle.blue_flame_sword.desc2: Increases burning duration by 5 seconds on hit
item.huanle.blue_flame_sword.desc3: Deals quadruple damage to burning targets
item.huanle.ender_hammer.desc: Can mine a 3x3 area of blocks
advancements.huanle.ender_hammer.title: Ender Crusher
item.huanle.forest_blade.desc2: 30% chance to apply Wither II effect for 5 seconds on hit
item.huanle.forest_blade.desc3: 3% chance to fully restore health on hit
item.huanle.forest_blade.desc4: Crouch-right-click to consume 10 health for Strength II effect for 10 seconds
advancements.huanle.forest_blade.title: Guardian of the Forest
item.huanle.death_scythe.desc: Absorbs 4 health points from enemies on hit
item.huanle.death_scythe.desc2: 5% chance to trigger Bleeding effect (removes 30% current health and causes continuous damage)
item.huanle.death_scythe.desc3: Crouch-right-click to consume 10 health and apply Wither II effect for 8 seconds to enemies
effect.huanle.fear.desc: Prevents any form of healing, including hunger recovery, saturation, regeneration effects, and instant health restoration
advancements.huanle.death_scythe.title: Reaper of Death
item.huanle.looting_dagger.desc: Comes with Fortune V enchantment, increasing loot drop rates
advancements.huanle.looting_dagger.title: Looter
item.huanle.fire_god_dagger.desc2: Sets entities on fire for 10 seconds on hit
advancements.huanle.lava_ingot.title: Molten Metal
advancements.huanle.fire_god_ingot.title: Essence of the Fire God
item.huanle.dragon_hunter_sword.desc: Right-click to teleport 8 blocks away (cooldown 5 seconds)
item.huanle.dragon_hunter_sword.desc3: Switching forms grants Strength II and Speed II effects for 30 seconds
item.huanle.awakened_dragon_hunter_sword: 20% chance to deal extra damage and apply Weakness effect
Right-click to apply Glowing effect to entities within a 20x20 area (cooldown 60 seconds)
Deals double damage to glowing entities

item.huanle.forest_armor.desc: Wearing the full set grants Regeneration II effect underwater
item.huanle.earth_sword.desc: Right-click: Heavy strike in front, damages nearby entities (cooldown 10 seconds)
item.huanle.earth_sword.desc2: Crouch-right-click: Causes an earthquake, shaking surrounding blocks and damaging entities (cooldown 10 seconds)

effect.huanle.ender_resistance.descripti: Immune to Ender Dragon breath and teleport damage from Ender Pearls
